headline: Southern Telecom Secures Largest Fiber Deal in Company History With Hyperscale Customer
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / April 22, 2025 /Southern Company Southern Telecom, a subsidiary of Southern Company, has secured its largest fiber deal to date, a monumental 300-mile fiber contract with a strategic hyperscale customer. This landmark ...

headline: Southern (NYSE:SO) Raises Dividend for 24th Year to US$2.96 Per Share
summary: Southern (NYSE:SO) recently announced an increase in its annual dividend, enhancing its legacy of consistent dividend growth. This commitment to shareholder returns is evident as the company increased its quarterly dividend by 2 cents. Over the last quarter, Southern's share price rose by 6%, a move that aligns with its solid history of returning value to its investors. While the market faced turbulence, including a 4% drop in overall market performance, Southern's actions in dividend...
